memberdef.argsstring: (T n, L const &f) noexcept
memberdef.name: ParallelForOMP

briefdescription.para: Performance-portable kernel launch function with optional OpenMP threading.

detaileddescription.para: For GPU builds and for CPU builds without OpenMP support, this is the same as ParalleFor. For CPU builds with OpenMP enabled, this function uses OpenMP threading.

memberdef.argsstring: (Box const &box, L const &f) noexcept

memberdef.name: ParallelFor

briefdescription.para: Facilities for expressing parallel computation and launching performance-portable kernels in AMReX.

detaileddescription.para: These interfaces provide a unified way to execute computational kernels on CPUs and GPUs without exposing backend-specific programming models.

Key functions and classes include:
amrex::ParallelFor
amrex::ParallelForOMP
amrex::ParallelForRNG
